author: Annie Gowen, Juliet Eilperin
title: Small town battled coronavirus on its own, as outbreak spread in a red state - The Washington Post
description: Small town battled coronavirus on its own, as outbreak spread in a red state The Washington Post View Full Coverage on Google News
content:
Long before schools around the country started closing their doors, the Bristow school system readied a program to feed kids if it shut down a must in a city with a 25 percent poverty rate.
